New account for new school year:
http://onesillyrabbit.livejournal.com/
Name thanks to Jess~. I love her SO much, especially since I couldn't think of anything for my life..

Someone should shove a gagdet down my throat that forces me to remember to post on LJ. X3 ANYWAY I GOT MY FLAT SCREEN MONITOR BACK SO NOW I DONT HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT A CAT BUTT AND TAIL IN MY LINE OF VISION SO NOW I SPAM YOU WITH PICTURES K? :] Lol. Tablet. Darque and Pocky were playing with the ball. :3 Yes, I named the Dauschuan(howeveryouspellthat) Pocky. More Pocky. :D We had a possum in our garage the night of the party o.o. Im so mad mom didnt wake me up so I could see it before she opened the door to let it out. It was a baby D: PARTY PICTURES :D Unfortunately, I didnt have the camera on me the whole time to catch the bursts of insanity. Like when my sister and 2 other people chased me around to shove cake in my face :P Erik, Cricket (who's 20 and mom doesnt know X3) and some old guy playing black jack xD I got the picture before Cricket could finish posing. Pocky was playing too! Charlie and Emilie stayed at the Roulette table the entire time xD This is the dealer, Chris, that several of my friends were flirting with. When I took the picture, he made me stop so I could get his brad pit side. XD Christa is in the front, then kim, then Nicole, and me :P I HAVE A BENDY STRAW OMG. ... Charlie's such a high better *rolls eyes* Once everyone got there, we pretty much split up into two groups to talk while we waited to play. Here's group 1: Jessica is on the far left, then Kim, back of christina's head, and then Krista :3 And here's group two! Im in the middle, Emily's on my right, Charlie's on my right, Erik's behind me, and so is Autumn, and Ronnie and Nicole are on the floor. Nicole is the blonde. :P THEREARENOINTENTIONSBEHINDTHEFACTTHATITOOKALOTOFPICTUREOFCHRIS. ANYWAY, Scariest picture of the night being that of charlie: This terrified me o 3o; AND NOWW. This is pocky, and her MOM, Yuffie the Pomeranian. Hard to believe, right? It's true. And yes, my cousin named Yuffie after Yuffie from FF. *rolls eyes* Raja, the rat, and Copper were having a stare down. xD This was absolutely a shocker to see. Pooter, the cat, hates our dogs. He was probally mad I kept throwing him off the computer monitor, and using Copper for warmth though. Its cute, nonetheless. This one speaks for itself. I mean, come on. I named her after Dark, for god's sake. ANYWAY. Yeah. Enjoy. X3

A tutorial attempt for: Do this effect:
program: Photoshop cs2 translateable: probally not level: basic knowledge needed Awhile ago, I saw a post from who wanted to know how someone did this sort of effect, so I decided to take a shot, since I knew it pretty well and it looked easy. 1. Get your images together in a nice neat order. 2. Layer: Flatten Image [or crtl+E to merge layers down together] 3. Image: Adjustments: Desaturate layer [Crtl+shift+U] 4. Depending on Image quality: duplicate layer: set to screen 5. Duplicate layer: Set to soft light 6. New layer: Go to the Gradient tool in the tool menu, and find the gradient you want to use, I used This 7. Pull the gradient in a straight, horizontal line across the image: Set the layer to soft light 8. Duplicate the gradient layer: Set to lighten: and play with the opacity. Mine's at 75 9. Now, set this as a new pattern. Edit: Define pattern 10. New layer: Use bucket tool: set the fill settings from foreground to pattern and fill the image with the pattern from 9. Set to soft light and play with settings. 11. If you can't see your image very well, duplicate the base, drag it to the top, and set to soft light. 12. And your done! Just add other things because Im tired and don't care anymore X] But if you want to know how to do the text I did, ask, and Ill add that later when Im conscience.

I'm considering shutting down my livejournal account since I never really use it. I was going to start really using it, but god knows I'm just a liar and won't. I might keep it since I mainly use Livejournal for my resources, but I'm not sure really. Plus, I have to finish my post to Naplasha, since I still want to make icons and all.

I'm not sure what I'm going to do, I'll think about it I geuss.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY, GABY~! I was sick today, otherwise I would have said it earlier u_u; But I luff you <3
